## Use case
Error workflows are an important part of running workflows in production. Get alerts for errors directly in your inbox.

![Screenshot 20240301 at 16.35.27.png](fileId:773)

## How to setup
1. Add your Gmail creds
2. Add your target email
2. Add this error workflow to other workflows
[docs here](https://docs.n8n.io/flow-logic/error-handling/#create-and-set-an-error-workflow)
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
